title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Haaram with South Sea Pearl Drop
materials: South Sea Pearl (2 stones at 8.57 carats each
1 stone at 4.14 for the Locket Drop). Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases a traditional Gutta Pusalu design reimagined with modern sensibilities. The necklace features intricately crafted floral and paisley motifs, each adorned with dazzling diamonds. The central pendant is a teardrop shape, housing a vibrant green emerald surrounded by diamonds. A lustrous South Sea pearl dangles gracefully, adding a touch of sophistication. The setting style emphasizes the brilliance of the diamonds, ensuring maximum sparkle. The Haaram's design is inspired by antique South Indian temple jewelry, with a contemporary twist.
colors: and Creamy White (South Sea Pearl). The classic combination of green and red gemstones with gold is a hallmark of South Indian bridal jewelry.
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions such as weddings (muhurtham)
and other celebratory events. Perfectly complements traditional silk sarees or lehengas. Also suitable for formal gatherings and special celebrations where you want to make a statement.
description: This is a true investment piece that combines timeless elegance with exquisite craftsmanship. The high-quality diamonds and precious gemstones ensure lasting value. The Gutta Pusalu design is a symbol of South Indian heritage, making it a culturally significant and meaningful piece. The brilliant-cut diamonds create unparalleled sparkle, guaranteeing you'll be the center of attention. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regal charm.
